snippet: A growing number of veterinarians are offering hospice care to cats and dogs, giving the pets — and their owners — a less anxious, more comfortable passing.
abstract: Growing number of veterinarians nationwide are offering hospice care to cats and dogs, giving pets--and their owners--a less anxious, more comfortable passing; approach entails ceasing aggressive medical treatment and giving pain-relieving and even anti-anxiety drugs.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of veterinarians are offering hospice care to cats and dogs, giving the pets — and their owners — a less anxious, more comfortable passing.

headline.main: All Dogs May Go to Heaven. These Days, Some Go to Hospice.
